channel.title: Getting linux on this old comp
channel.description:
well i dont know how to find the disk space but heres a screen shot of my memory etc...ram...

item.title: Getting linux on this old comp
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:70183”]That’s more than enough to run a Linux.

If you are fairly new to it all and want to get up and running as soon as possible, but want it to run nicely on that older hardware, I recommend Xubuntu.[/quote]
Thank you!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Getting linux on this old comp
